entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
